title: WhatsNewMessage
description: A template for the messages that appear in the What's New panel.

oneOf.description: Id of localized string to be rendered.

published_date.description: The date/time (number of milliseconds elapsed since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC) the message was published.

allOf.description: Id of localized string or message override of What's New message title
Id of localized string or message override of What's New message body
(optional) Id of localized string or message override of What's New message link text

cta_url.description: Target URL for the What's New message.

icon_url.description: (optional) URL for the What's New message icon.
